name: The medieval plague
description:
A game i made for the "Good morning apocalypse" game jam.

-Game purpose: you help the residents that are stuck in their house 'cause of the pandemic by doing verity of tasks.

-Engine: game maker studio 2.0

-The game was made in 1 week

-It takes about 3-6 minutes to complete the game

-Assets - from Itch

-Sound - soundimage.org
